name: metrics_repair
description: Metrics snapshot for the repair tile

total_pkt_count.description: How many network packets we have sent, including reqs, pings, pongs, etc

sent_pkt_types.description: What types of client messages are we sending

repaired_slots.description: Until which slots have we fully repaired

current_slot.description: Our view of the current cluster slot, max slot received

request_peers.description: How many peers have we requested

sign_tile_unavail.description: How many times no sign tiles were available to send request

eager_repair_aggresses.description: How many times we pass eager repair threshold

rerequest_queue.description: How many times we re-request a shred from the inflights queue

malformed_ping.description: How many times we received a malformed ping
